original: 沛國譙縣人，東晉開國君主晉元帝司馬睿生母，夏侯淵後人。據傳司馬睿乃夏侯光姬與姓牛小吏私通所生，應驗了「牛繼馬後」的讖語。
text: Peiguo Qiaoxian, the birth mother of Sima Rui, the founding monarch of the Eastern Jin Dynasty, Emperor Jin Yuan, descendants of Xia Houyuan. According to legend, Sima Rui was born of an affair between Xiahou Guangji and the surname Niu Xiaoli, and he fulfilled the prophecy of "the cow succeeds the horse."
